item.description: Join us for some coffee and snacks at the Espresso Royale Caffe. This is a social event for anyone who wants to meet comrades from the Socialist Party of Boston. We will undoubtedly talk about politics, activism, current events, socialism and whatever else is on our minds. If you have questions like "What is socialism?" or "What is the Socialist Party?" this is the space to have informal conversations and get your questions answered.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be wearing SPUSA buttons.
item.name: Socialist Kaffeeklatsch
